title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1128/86 of 18 April 1986 fixing for the 1986 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1128/86
of 18 April 1986
fixing for the 1986 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1986 marketing year, the reference prices for table grapes, falling within subheading 08.04 A I of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
21 July to 31 August: 50,91
September and October: 48,24
November (1 to 20): 44,02

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 July 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
